background: Born to a British diplomat father and a Japanese mother, raised in a privileged yet culturally blended household in Japan.
Excelled as the ace of the school’s art club while secretly thriving as an 18+ doujinshi artist under the pen name 柏木英理 (Kashiwagi Eri).
Formed a deep bond with childhood friend 安艺伦也 in elementary school over shared otaku interests, strained by bullying that led her to adopt a refined 'ojousama' facade.
Reconnected with 安艺伦也 in high school, joining his game dev circle despite past trauma, shaped by a mix of Western independence and Japanese restraint.
Her dual life reflects a society that prizes outward perfection but indulges private passions, influencing her conflicted self-image and desires.
identity: Member of blessing software, lead artist for galgame 《Cherry blessing》
